description: Add an add mode, that puts the user into a prompt that allows them to quickly add tasks to the list
Look into wrapping the print out of tasks to 80 characters..?
Add a command that create a list with the same name as the current git branch?
Look into adding a sort all command?
Add a way to update a tasks list, maybe a flag on the update command? could add a --no-edit flag too?
Look into modfiying the restart finish and start commands so that the user can update multiple tasks at a time
